backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and state maps for maintenance, expenditures, complaints, notices, visitor requests, users, and notifications, with authorization and helper functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to impacted files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose, behavior, and key implementation details.
frontend/deploy/ic-deploy-with-retry.sh: Shell script wrapping dfx deploy with retry logic, cycles/wallet readiness checks, and detailed error messaging.
frontend/deploy/ic-precreate-canisters.s: Script that pre-creates backend and frontend canisters on IC mainnet to avoid CaLM reservation issues.
frontend/deploy/README.md: Documentation describing IC mainnet deployment helper tools and their capabilities such as retries and cycles checks.
frontend/docs/deployment-troubleshooting: Troubleshooting guide for IC mainnet deployment covering prerequisites, cycles checks, and common failure modes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark OKLCH themes and base styling variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining PWA metadata and a styled startup fallback screen used before React mounts.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configuring app name, icons, theme, and display settings for Vision Galaxy.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, fetch routing, and offline fallback behavior for app assets and navigation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app managing authentication, profile loading, routing, and startup state handling.
frontend/src/components/FatalStartupErro: Component showing a fatal startup error UI with reload and hard-reload options.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout component handling navigation, user profile loading, notifications, PWA install prompts, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Reusable card component for dashboard sections with icon, title, optional description, actions, and variants.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first‑time users to enter name, role, and optional flat number and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorBoun: Error boundary that captures early startup errors and displays the fatal startup screen.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Non-fatal startup error screen offering retry, logout, and hard reload options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and persistence via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Hook that listens for the PWA install prompt event and exposes installability state and an install trigger.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of data-fetching and mutation hooks that call backend actor methods for user profiles, maintenance, payments, notifications, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables, dark mode styles, responsive tweaks, and print-specific rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ChangePasswordPage.ts: Provides a form for users to change their password with validation and triggers logout after success.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticeDetailPa: Displays full details of a selected notice, including title, message, and optional expiry date.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticesPage.ts: Shows a sortable list of notices with export, print, and creation options for secretaries.
frontend/src/pages/common/NotificationsP: Lists unread and read notifications with actions to mark individual or all as read.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintDetailP: Shows detailed information for a specific complaint, including status, priority, and resolution notes.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintsPage.t: Form and list view for lodging new complaints and displaying existing complaints for a flat.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ExpendituresPage: Placeholder page informing users that expenditure tracking is not yet supported by the backend.
frontend/src/pages/flat/FlatDashboardPag: Dashboard showing maintenance status, complaints, notices, expenditures, visitor requests, and profile navigation for a flat.
Interface for viewing monthly maintenance records, paying via UPI, and submitting payment details.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ProfilePage.tsx: Page to view, add, edit, and save up to four mobile numbers associated with a flat.
frontend/src/pages/flat/VisitorRequestsP: Allows residents to review, approve, or decline visitor requests with validation of flat numbers.
frontend/src/pages/guard/GuardDashboardP: Dashboard for security guards showing pending visitor requests, request creation, and notices.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestC: Form page allowing guards to create a visitor request, submit it via mutation, and open a WhatsApp deep link for approval.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestD: Displays details of a specific visitor request including status, purpose, flat info, and contact number.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequests: Lists all visitor requests with status badges, navigation to details, and an option to create new requests.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders an Internet Identity login screen with error handling and optional custom logo loading.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsA: Admin dashboard for viewing, exporting, printing, and summarizing all resident complaints.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsR: Print-optimized page showing a full complaints report with counts and a table of all complaints.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/components/: Skeleton UI component showing loading placeholders for the secretary settings page.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/CreateNotic: Form for secretaries to create a notice with optional expiry and submit it to the system.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/Expenditure: Provides UI to view, edit, and save monthly expenditure records, including CSV export and print options.
Renders a print‑friendly expenditure report for a given month and year and auto‑triggers printing.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/NoticesRepo: Displays a print‑ready table of all notices sorted by ID and triggers printing once loaded.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/OverduePage: Shows overdue flats for a selected period with month/year filters and overdue reminders.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsPag: Shows maintenance payment status for all flats with CSV export and print options for a selected period.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsRep: Generates a print‑friendly maintenance payment report including counts and detailed statuses.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SecretaryDa: Dashboard linking to payments, overdue, expenditures, complaints, notices, and settings with quick stats.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SettingsPag: React page for managing secretary settings including logo upload, maintenance amount, UPI ID, and guard mobile number with validation and update logic.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Utility functions to generate CSV from data and trigger CSV file downloads.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Date helpers for formatting timestamps and retrieving month and year info.
frontend/src/utils/flatNumbers.ts: Utilities to generate, validate, and format society flat numbers within defined ranges.
frontend/src/utils/hardReload.ts: Clears caches and service workers before forcing a hard page reload.
frontend/src/utils/overdue.ts: Helpers to determine overdue periods and whether to show overdue notices.
frontend/src/utils/print.ts: Utilities to open a print view and trigger the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/utils/settingsValidation.ts: Validation logic for secretary settings fields including maintenance amount, UPI ID, and guard contact.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Builds a UPI deep link string for payment requests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp deep link for sending a prefilled message to a phone number.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and the main issue of a blank Draft/Preview screen. Contains requirements for HTML fallback UI, startup diagnostics, and service worker cache invalidation.
